5 reported that the U.S. president's official residence ? ? There are rumors that the White House is actually in the secret construction of a large "doomsday bunker" for a nuclear strike in the White House was so critical moment for the U.S. President to hide the use!

White House overnight change site
Over the past few weeks, the U.S. president's official residence in Washington, DC ? ? White House, as if into a deafening big construction site. All kinds of heavy machinery and metals, building materials were transported to the White House site after another site. White House West Wing, previously responsible for building the front door and the security guards have been invisible, the White House, replaced by a tall green and white plywood fence around the site up. Where in the White House on Pennsylvania Avenue, only to see the White House West Wing, second floor roof of the building.
Tremendous changes in the White House for many passers-by and the high spirits of visitors come to the White House are endless wonder. After some investigation reportersPanasonic Lumix DMC-FZ45 Battery Chargerthey were shocked to learn that the original, the White House is a cost of $ 86,000,000 of projects and in the White House West Wing, near the building to dig the tunnel, the construction of the White House's "underground facilities." In the next several years of construction period, the famous White House West Wing Building, construction sites will be blocked temporarily from sight in people "disappeared"!

To facilitate the construction of the first dig
According to reports, in charge of the "Great construction of the White House," the U.S. General Services Administration (GSA). In accordance with the GSA official said, the construction of the key tasks is to upgrade the White House underground facilities. Specific reconstruction projects, including water and sewer pipes, electrical pipes, hot and cold water and hot steam system and storm drains. In addition, heating and cooling systems, and fire alarm system will also be replaced. In order to facilitate the construction, must be in the White House following a tunnel excavation.
According to reports, the White House throughout the construction project will eventually surface area of ??the White House, for a total cost of 376 million, for a total duration will be up to 4 years! A GSA official in charge said that in the next few years, the White House 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue is located will be a noisy construction site.


Actually built secret "doomsday bunker?"
According to reports, the White House suddenly opened tunneling news came to light, immediately caused a stir speculation. There are rumors that the White House why spend lots of money to dig the tunnel, in fact, in order to build a large secret "doomsday bunker" for a nuclear strike in the White House was the case of extreme emergency, the President and his entourage for hiding purposes. There are also rumors that the building of the tunnel is being built, in fact, for the President of the "doomsday escape" the entrance to it with a "secret underground Drive" linked to the president in the safe evacuation of the disaster comes, God will not hesitate drove to another place of safety!

Guess
The White House has several authentic?
Guess who said, in fact, the current White House has had several authentic. One of the most well known is the way to the White House, "President of the Emergency Operations Center" (PEOC) to which the underground corridor,Samsung TL210 Battery Charger PEOC at the White House East Wing, 6 floors underground, is sufficient to prevent the atomic bombing of a bunker. September 11, 2001, when the Twin Towers after the terrorist attack, then President Bush, Vice President Dick Cheney and other White House officials was sneaked into the bunker, where the command operation of the Government.

Photography: landscape, portrait guide

Landscape photography article:
First, the great mountains and rivers
Mountains Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ40 Battery Chargerand rivers to be taken note of the following principles:
1, to seize the seasonal variation. Because of natural phenomena are the changes with the seasons, so the change of seasons is taken to master the key to success.
2, seize the time change. Those who wanted to make mountains and rivers, should pay attention to the changes caused by the time the scene changes. For example, the change before and after sunrise, especially on the light color change greatly. Therefore, we must rush to the scene before sunrise in order to fully observe the changes and use of images from which to seize the best opportunity. In addition, Samsung TL225 Battery Chargerthe summer noon, is light for photography is usually bad, but if in the valley, the use of top light shooting at noon, mountain ash will become blue, as a background, the performance of deep valleys in the woods, villages, richer flavor. The evening will always be a subtle light and bright clouds. So sunrise sunset take more than the advantages and characteristics.
3, to seize the weather changes. Landscape shooting style, for the use of weather is also very important. For example, the cloud is the natural beauty of a scene, it can play a modified screen view, and enhance the atmosphere, to enhance the role of mood; Similarly, the fog mountain scenery is the special landscape character rare scene, because the fog can change the natural landscape features, such as change the landscape of the space level, form and color and so on.
4, to seize the angle changes. Landscape shooting style, have to pay attention to select the shooting location, different heights and different directions, the angle the picture effect produced is different. In general, the shooting point should choose a little higher, and to stand on the mountain, that mountain is a good shot. Because if the bottom of the mountain peaks or in the mountainside in the film, often can not see the Peak, or the result of perspective distortion, the original will seem neither steep steep mountain is not high. If the foot side of the lake, standing on the lake to the mountains and its reflection in the water intake screen together, often rendering effective and exaggerating thePanasonic Lumix DMC-FS3 Battery Charger towering peaks and atmosphere. In composition, the reflection of the screen shot Mountain View, King might hold enough that the resulting picture of the mountain male beauty.

Photography: Landscape, portrait Guide 2

2, shooting waterfalls grasp itsFX8 "potential" of different waterfalls have different shooting style. If the potential falls slow trickle, not look, can be more slowly, so water was completely dynamic. Different illumination angles, can also lead to changes in the waterfall of color flow, as in the early morning or evening sun shine sunset, the waterfalls flowing water will be presented a smooth golden brown. Often observed with the eye when shooting white water, can only feel light and dark shades of difference in tone, looks very plain, but due to the different light, the effect is different. For example, a positive light so that the performance was dazzling waterfall white luster because of the lack of contrast, appear more plain; side light and top backlit by the waterfall of white light part of the performance, the performance of the light blue shaded with blue, set off each other , sparkling crystal clear water texture; backlit film, water is often subject to less direct sunlight and other features in the shadow of cliffs, waterfalls and running TZ2water was dark blue. In addition, point shooting distance, there will be different effects, close range reflects its momentum, the performance of its momentum panorama.

Photography: landscape, portrait guide3

Third, the grassland pastures

Fourth, beach beach

3, to play the role of the filter taken at a beach pp, with filters to increase contrast, reduce fog or highlight color, to improve the coastal landscape of the photo. If using a polarizer can be added to the blue sky and the elimination of reflections, Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ7 Battery Chargermirrors can also be used to make sea stars produce light flicker effect.

2, pat agricultural production activities take rural rural scenery, still should combine XiaChu, autumn and spring DongCang. At this time of desert light and shade effect is good, can show the beauty of deserts and magic.

2, the vast environment sand waves formation is organized, main performance are also in the picture, or must be density and orderly can give a person with not harmonious feeling. In the desert and sand wave and sand waves around distance between larger, if take ZongXian composition, it can be difficult to reflect the Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ100 Battery Chargerdune sea, therefore, the vast scene passage composition is easy to work. In order to more horizontal line composition, can use to break through the prosaic or sand ridge to slash to get vivid and symmetry, the layout structure.

Microsoft's day tip users to upgrade IE9

Microsoft plans on April 18, will today by Windows update tip users to upgrade to IE9.

Microsoft said on Thursday, Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ2 Battery Chargerafter the launch of the plan for Windows Vista and Windows 7 PC users to upgrade automatically start to provide IE9.

Responsible for IE browser marketing in Roger Capriotti on his blog, "said automatic installation, IE9 will not get users to agree to install IE9 will only."

IE9 upgrade notice when I received the Vista or Windows 7 hints at startup IE7 user, the screen of IE8 or appear three options: installation browser, reject, delayed IE9 upgrades. If the user chose a final option, IE9 will once again after the installation of provide tips.

Windows XP users will not see IE9 upgrade notice, because the dominant IE9 can't run on the XP operating system. Suitable for XP system's latest browser is the 2009 IE8.

And usually browsers and operating system than the main upgrade service pack, Microsoft will gradually deployment this update, and not every user will immediately see IE9. Microsoft plans to finish the upgrade planned at the end of June.

To avoid enterprisePanasonic Lumix DMC-TZ10 Battery Charger users update service influence by Windows, will begin in June for enterprise users to provide IE9 updates. In the meantime, enterprise can deploy a intercept tools, to prevent Updata IE9 through the Windows update to the company computers.

Vista and Windows 7 users in mid-march have manually download and install IE9.

Microsoft has confirmed that it will be to run the four IE9 browser Windows system version within the whole life cycle IE9 security update provide support.

"IE9 will support Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008 and Windows Servicer 2008 R2 whole life cycle." A Microsoft spokesman said.

Microsoft's commitment to Vista home basic edition means, senior version and the flagship edition family IE9 security update user support to January 2015. Vista commercial version and Vista enterprise version of the enterprise users IE9 security update support to 2017 April.

Meanwhile, Windows 7Samsung IA-BH125C, HMX-R10 Battery Chargerintroductory edition, family basic edition, family senior version and the flagship version can obtain the user IE9 until 2015 security update on January, and the professional edition and enterprise users until 2020 1 month.

Take down lens cap and check the dust or spots lens. In the same camera lens blower or canned air Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ5drum into the air, to eliminate particles and dirt.

Step 2

Please use superfine fiber cloth or lens paper carefully lens. A no chemicals of ultrafine fiber cloth can be used for digital camera super clean, won't scratch or other means daub natural material can.

Step 3

Use lens brush to clean dirt around embedded in the aperture of glass lenses trapped


Step 4

Superfine fiber cloth is used on lens a little liquid persistent dirt on clear lens. Application of a few small cloth drops; Brush in circular motion of dirt on camera is deleted. Panasonic Lumix DMC-TS1

Step 5

Digital camera dry rear can use camera pens, in order to eliminate any stubborn spots or smear test. Treatment of antelope in pen cloth mat effectively remove the glass surface, wipe grease and oil in lens. Many come in handy double sets and action on one side to the other, pen writing brush.

Step 6

Store your digital camera lens cleaner soft bag or plastic suitcases equipment to keep it clean, Samsung TL100and ready to use. Tightly cover the front of the lens storage fluid.

Digital camera exposure tips

Digital cameras easy to use, after shooting through the playback can immediately know the actual shooting, combined with post-contrast in color to adjust the computer,Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ2 Battery Charger so there are many photographers in practice, the accuracy of exposure is not very attention, in fact, requirements for exposure using a digital camera is also very high, in practice, paying particular attention to shooting on "exposure compensation" used in the shooting a number of special objects, but also to use their traditional photography experience, full use of exposure compensation to meet the specific circumstances of the exposure needs to ensure pictures are accurate exposure. 1. Why should we make of digital camera exposure compensation exposure metering systems and traditional cameras, in dealing with images, there is a very basic guidelines, that is, all the subject are in accordance with brightness of 18% of the neutral gray to restore, so In the photographic camera system, no matter how the object is the original brightness, the brightness of the final should be medium tone display. Therefore, the actual shooting, the photographer still needs to shoot the scene according to the complexity of the situation to judge accordingly, is the only way to ensure good density and color reproduction. Portable digital cameras are generally plus or minus 2 block large exposure compensation, use them to meet the most complex cases of shooting. As for some advanced single-lens reflex digital camera, exposure compensation to plus or minus 5 or even block to meet the lighting environment is extremely complex shooting needs. Digital camera design and manufacturer of the reason for the design of the camera for such treatment, the act itself is enough to explain the exposure compensation on the photo quality is of great significance, is the main technical points can not be ignored. Under normal circumstances, the need for the use of exposure compensation, the photographer must take into account the following main aspects. 2. The subject is relatively high brightness is required for exposure compensation such as when shooting landscape photos, and if the contents of the blue and white and other light tones accounted for a larger area, it is necessary to consider appropriate increased exposure, increased by at least half-block along light , side plus one block or so. If it is backlit, it is necessary for dealing with high and low position of the sun, while the performance of what you see, usually you want the details of the screen can also be appropriate in the performance, then we would be increased exposure of about 1.5-2 gear, the sun is more center of the screen, the more necessary to appropriately increase the exposure (of course, should also pay attention to avoid the strong sun light to prevent damage to the camera image sensor. If the sun did not issue a strong light, such as the red mist, Asahi sunset, etc. because of their low brightness, will not impact on metering, exposure compensation is not necessary to consider the issue). In addition, in shooting snow, fog, landscape and other specific content, should be based on performance to the last to show the characteristics of high-profile form, as appropriate for exposure compensation. Snow usually best to compensate for a blocked shot to the exposure half a block, or you end up with snow is not white, which mayPanasonic Lumix DMC-TS1 Battery Charger be due to insufficient light gray; Fog best shooting half-block to a block compensation exposure, or you get the tone dim view of fog near the night in general, is clearly not ideal. There are like shooting a white stage, groups of people who wear white clothes, hospital or laboratory environment, high brightness, large area of ??the sky as the background of the aircraft rather special object, to be based on the relationship between subject and background for exposure is appropriate compensation. 3. Lower brightness of the subject of negative exposure compensation to be made in dealing with the subject of high brightness required for the exposure is compensated, mainly to prevent the automatic processing of camera images for the lack of exposure. Similarly, shooting deep color object, you need to do the opposite, in order to avoid overexposure. Typical city night scenes in the film, in addition to screen buildings, streets or other content of higher brightness occupies an area outside the main screen, to prevent excessive exposure has two main methods, one is to use spot metering to the main performance targets Exposure; Another way is based on the actual situation, the appropriate use of exposure compensation to reduce exposure. Usually in the footage (especially the sensitive parts of metering center of the screen) occupies a large area of ??sky, they often need to reduce the 2 block or more exposure. 4. Relationship between the subject and the background to be flexible when dealing with this complex there are two cases: A. the background of high brightness, low brightness of the subject, to be positive for exposure compensation. This meeting people at the shooting often occurs, sometimes people sitting in the window, and launched into the sun behind the window, the background and the characters seemed more significantly dim light, then if not using flash as fill light, to be positive for exposure compensation, usually about 1 block to increase the exposure compensation, the characters will significantly improve the level of the face. When shooting backlit portraits as well, if the background includes a large area of ??sky, water objects such as high brightness, but also by being compensated or use other form of assistance to improve the contrast of light, or will affect the reflection of the main characters . Even if the post by image processing software to brighten the figures, will be significantly affected by noise image quality. B. Background of low brightness, high brightness of the subject, to be negative for exposure compensation. This situation often encountered in the photographic arena, usually one or a small amount of the stage performance by actors, in order to attract the audience's attention, often using one or twoSamsung ES55 Battery Charger chasing light shines on the people, and other background on the stage this time because not directly affected by light exposure, almost rendered as black, so a great contrast between the two, unless the performers right in the center of the screen and you are using spot metering mode, or be sure to make a negative exposure compensation, or prone to overexposure.

Input text with a digital camera

To achieve text entry with a digital camera, take a photo into a computer, and then converted into text format recognition software.
When the boss throws you stack of files, so you knock a computer, word for word, would you feel about to collapse? Have you ever thought you could be better and more economicalSamsung TL225digital camera's "typist"?

Today, digital cameras have been heavily into the homes of ordinary people. For the average user, the use of digital camera to take a photo, it is only right and proper thing. But with a digital camera to input text, I am afraid that most people in the eyes of a little fantasy. Now, we come to introduce this detached unique skills - to input text with a digital camera, the true "Kung Fu."

Shooting

With a 300 million or more pixels, more than 3 times optical zoom digital camera to take pictures of the original. Must pay attention when shooting: the original flat to the camera to end flat, the light should be soft uniform. Can scatter light in the corridor or window, the three primary colors can also be taken under fluorescent lamp eye protection.

Correctly identify the film clearly is the key behind the 300 million or more pixels can guarantee the text for identification after shooting enough; more than 3 times optical zoom when shooting to the original in every line of words full screen. I have compared the 300-megapixel shot than shooting with 200 million pixels significantly higher recognition rate.

Do not use flash, the light is too strong, but the writing is not clear filmed.

Conversion

To build a computer hard drive folder to one of these images into. But the contrast between these images is very small, the entire screen is gray; and a variety of digital camera Panasonic Lumix DMC-TZ1image format is different, OCR software (text recognition software) can not support it advisable to use ACDSee or Windows built-in "Paint" program conversion.

The author is in the Windows built-in "Paint" program to convert. First, Click "Paint ? File ? Open" in the "Look" needs to find a picture, open and click "Save As" in the "Save as type" Select "monochrome bitmap."

Click "Save", the prompt will pop language "save as this format may result in loss of color information, and you like to continue anyway" and continue to click "Yes" to complete the conversion. Converted originally adopted by the new images, the extension to ". Bmp", is automatically saved in the original folder.

Identification

OCR software is running (you can download from the Internet, I use a Tsinghua TH-OCR2000 Millennium Pro), then click "File ? Open" in the "Look" to find your pictures. Click the "order" drop-down menu appears, if you need full-text recognition, you can click on the "all recognition", OCR software to recognize that. The upper part of the software window is the result of shooting, converted the original image, the lower part is identified in the text. Recognition automatically created after the original name of the txt file in use, save in the original folder.

If you only need to identify some of the text, press and hold the left mouse button in the need to identify parts of the text out of the box, the yellow block appears, click on "Recognition" can be.

Finishing

Established at the beginning of the folder to find the extension txt text file, which is the required information, and modify the word recognition errors, especially the originaPanasonic Lumix DMC-FZ5l and adding emphasis underlined text, the recognition rate is also higher than low. At the same time in the folder, there are many extension chr, trc, sim file, which is generated when the OCR recognition temporary files can be deleted.

Lotus shooting skills exchange

Since ancient times the lotus has "flowers gentleman," the name, its strength of character and attitude to reflect the essence of Chinese traditional culture, and hence also the minds of the Chinese intellectuals of the natural model. For flower lovers and photography enthusiasts, the lotus is the eternal theme of shooting, compared with the normal flower, the lotus does have a unique beauty, whether it is the flower bud is the stem of the leaf has its own unique charm, and even pond The damaged leaves will give a unique beauty. Lotus with a digital camera to have the edge because, although the lotus flower as a large, very far away from the photographer may not be Xie Wan at arm's length, so far are usually taken with a long lens to "tune" in the viewfinder and composition there will be some difficulties, there are some unnecessary content is taken to the screen. In the post-processing digital photo flaws such as small changes there will be a great convenience, making it easy to get a more perfect image. So as a photographer for the lotus with a digital camera, one is to follow the relevant skills in traditional photography, but also the characteristics from the digital image itself, taking into account the late start of the processing and handling, so that it easy to be different effect:

1. Take full advantage of leaves. Lotus flowers not only beautiful, but leaves quite a beauty, so take time to make full use of leaves to the composition. Photo "Flower and Leaf," the main effect of using leaves to form the screen. Almost noon when shooting because of the time, Lotus has begun to wither Shoulong, found that lotus leaves in the top light illumination in Xiatian JiangSamsung HZ25W Battery Chargerhas exquisitely carved effect, in addition to the context of the lotus, the leaves show the context of semi-transparent is also exceptionally clear. Leaves as the main character can be, arrange the flowers in the appropriate place for artistic creation. In order to achieve relatively simple composition, with huge lotus leaves mainly the finishing touch to red flowers in the picture. This scenario leaves the brightness according to the exposure, you can get good color reproduction.

2. To keep the background simple. Lotus itself is very simple lines, either leaves or stems flowers are simple, do not shoot do not spread, so in the shooting according to its characteristics, mainly to do with simplicity. Composition is often more simple, the picture the better. Generally by selecting appropriate background to achieve their goals. When the pond by the backlight, or other leaves of the trees the shadow of the shadow so get out the effect of a dark lining. If the photographer close to the lotus easy, but also squat in the bank shot, the sky in the background, will receive a light colored background effect. But for digital photography, while considering the simple composition, but also to the content they need a relatively complete these arrangements, since the late finishing extra content can be removed, and in the need to modify the content of defects found to make up for relatively longer trouble.

3. The appropriate use of embellishment. Lotus in the shooting, they often can see a dragonfly perched on flowers. In fact, dragonflies can be said to be a perfect match flowers, dotted with dragonflies, flowers will be even more full of life. Do not quickly found near the Dragonfly, the best pre-exposure of the camera settings such as good, and will adjust to the telephoto end of the focal length and then gradually move closer. Once the dragonfly flew away frightened and do not be discouraged, can be stationary in place to wait a while because dragonflies will fly back to the original location of habitat. Optimistic about it a shot, you just have enough patience, can shoot entirely successful. Some people like to shoot bees flying in to spend the lens, so that the contents of particular note the location of the bees the flowers and proportion, because the flowers large, small bees, if the position and shape is not appropriate, then, to fix people feel like a waste to spend the same stick, but not the United States.

4. Take a sprinkler to science. Some people like the lotus with water, and shooting pool with the dew on the petals of the lens, in fact, very thin petals of the lotus, the flowers in full bloom because of the weight of the water sink, giving the feeling of decay, but the image is poor. In addition to bud Hanbaoyufang proper watering can, the effect of the petals may not be a good watering.
In fact, could not simply stick lotus water sprinklers up if you vain man, it immediately rolled into the lotus leaf to shoot "big pearls falling into a jade plate" of the lens, only the next shot after the rain. If it rains that night, to film the next morning to have water droplets on the leaves of the lens. "Lotus drops" is shooting in Shanghai, People's Park, a world before shooting off a big storm, in order to take these drops, I go to the park early in the morning the next day, really get it. Through the viewfinder when shooting backlit to enhance the brightness drops. Shooting parameters are aperture F6.3, shutter speed 1 / 500 second, ISO ISO200, shooting time is 7:03 pm in early July morning. Taken great pains to introduce this time seems a bit redundant, in fact, useful and photographers shooting time if not pay attention to it, is likely to leave empty-handed, because the lotus is turned off in the afternoon, after ten in the morning and taken to the satisfaction of hard gesture.

5. Take a variety of different "parts." Shooting lotus flower is actually a naturally formed film on the composition, is to shoot lotus leaf, bud, Lianpeng different combinations of such. The benefits of using a digital camera is that you can shoot according to their own needs to a variety of different "parts", the last according to their needs to integrate them into a satisfying picture. Flower photography is art because it is entirely possible to have a free hand, "deceitful" to achieve from life than life effect. Determined to collect material may have consciously taken a number of relatively independent and complete leaf, flower shape and meet the needs of various shapes of flower buds, Lian Peng, etc., the best light when shooting direction can be noted, do not clutter the environment with light, while To avoid inconsistencies in the content will be integrated with light, shadow and projection to avoid the lack of coordination and other issues. After a lot of material, processing images in the future there will be handy feeling. Photo "slim" in the flowers and flower buds are relatively independent, and arranged in a simple black background before, when needed can be easily cut and paste and so on.

6. Do not think twice of small defects. Natural growth of the lotus is often difficult to be perfect, they are sometimes hard to avoid this kind of small disadvantages, especially for various reasons, lotus leaves often have spots of different colors, Panasonic DMW-BCG10, DMW-BCG10PP Charger, Lumix DMC-ZS1, Lumix DMC-TZ6, Lumix DMC-ZS3, Lumix DMC-TZ7 Battery ChargerItem number DMW-BCG10 small crease marks broken or insect bites, etc. . If the past use of traditional camera, even if other content well, also tried to evade photographers often give up shooting these deficiencies. Do not have a digital camera regardless of these shortcomings, as these small defects later with "rubber stamp" for the change is easy. Therefore, traditional cameras to digital cameras from a friend with particular attention to the transitional change of mindset, both in the viewfinder when shooting to consider pressing the shutter release when shooting a one-time success rate, but also factors to consider post-modification treatment, for the repair of the defects are not too sure care, even when shooting so that you feel would be best of both worlds.

7. On the metering and exposure. Even the use of digital cameras, to pay attention when shooting the same exact exposure. In general, the film has scenes of lotus flowers, medium shot, close-up, etc., if it is shooting a big scene, the camera can be an average weighted auto exposure, generally not a problem, because the red or pink flowers and leaves similar brightness.
